articles.author: VnExpress
articles.title: President receives Australian governor-general
articles.description: President Vo Van Thuong hosted a ceremony Tuesday morning to welcome Australian Governor-General David Hurley, who is on a state visit to Vietnam.
articles.content: The ceremony took place at the Presidential Palace in Hanoi, making Governor-General Hurley the first guest that President Thuong has received since he took office on March 2.
